nodes.documentation:
This contract will create all the functionalities related to a store.

 * For example
- Adding a product
- updating a product
- customer being able to view the list of stores
- store owner being able to see the stores
- customer being able to view the products in a given Store
nodes.name: Store

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

arguments.value: Only an Administrator can invoke this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

nodes.documentation: Only (store) owners shall be allowed to add or update the store specific details - e.g. product.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
A store owner will use this function to add a new product to his / her store.

     * Whenever a new product is added, the product map will be updated to hold all the product and their details
across all the store and store owners.
nodes.name: addProductToTheStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!"

arguments.value: Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!"

nodes.documentation:
The update product function will be called to update the details of an existing function.

     * In a regular course of a business, the following amounts may get updated.
- quantity
- productName
- price
- description
nodes.name: updateProduct

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the active product can be marked as removed!"

arguments.value: Only the active product can be marked as removed!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the active product can be marked as removed!"

nodes.documentation:
A store owner can decide to remove a product from his/her store.
A removed product will not be visible to shoppers!
nodes.name: removeProduct

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the active product can be bought!"

arguments.value: Only the active product can be bought!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the active product can be bought!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The owner cannot buy its own product!"

arguments.value: The owner cannot buy its own product!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The owner cannot buy its own product!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The store does not have sufficient quantity of the product"

arguments.value: The store does not have sufficient quantity of the product

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The store does not have sufficient quantity of the product"

nodes.documentation: The shopper can buy this product using this function.
nodes.name: buyProductFromStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The current store's balance must be greater than the withdrawal amount!"

arguments.value: The current store's balance must be greater than the withdrawal amount!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The current store's balance must be greater than the withdrawal amount!"

nodes.documentation: A store owner can withdraw fund from a given store
nodes.name: withdrawFund
